name: World23B: Kalzion v0.1 Alpha (WIP Price will go up)
name_original: World23B: Kalzion v0.1 Alpha (WIP Price will go up)
description: Your Name is Militia, You live in a Nearly Deserted place known as Kalzion in the Zephyr Village of the Falcioz District. Your Family, Killed by Orcs, Along with most of the townspeople. Very Few remain. Its your job to begin your revenge...
